name: Fil d'Ariadna
author: Efraim Bayarri

sections.description:
Fild’Ariadna gives you a shortcode to insert in your pages and will display a breadcrumb of the last pages or posts visited by the current LOGGED user.

Just insert the shortcode [fildariadna] in your pages and that’s all.

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.
